title: RA Sushi serves Cinnamon Tempura Ice Cream
statement: RA Sushi offers Cinnamon Tempura Ice Cream, which is lightly battered cinnamon-swirl ice cream that is flash fried.

citations.quote: CINNAMON TEMPURA ICE CREAM Lightly battered cinnamon-swirl ice cream, flash fried and finished with raspberry and chocolate sauces
